text: Club Santos Laguna S.A. de C.V. () commonly known as Santos Laguna or Santos, is a Mexican professional football club. They represent Comarca Lagunera, which includes Torreón, Gómez Palacio, and Lerdo. Santos Laguna currently plays in the Liga MX. The club started in 1982. They reached Mexico's top division in 1988 after buying the franchise belonging to the Ángeles de Puebla. They have won five league championship titles and the Apertura 2014 Copa MX. == Honours == === Domestic === *Mexican Primera División/Liga MX: (6) ::Invierno 1996, Verano 2001, Clausura 2008, Clausura 2012, Clausura 2015 Clausura 2018 ::Runner-up (5): 1993–94, Verano 2000, Bicentenario 2010, Apertura 2010, Apertura 2011 *Copa MX: (1) ::Apertura 2014 *InterLiga: (1) ::2004 === International === *CONCACAF Champions League: ::Runner-up (2): 2011–12, 2012–13 === Friendly === * Copa Torreón: 1985. * Torneo Fútbol Tres: 1994. * Copa Corona: 2000. * Copa Gobernador Cero Marginación (2): 2006, 2008. * Trofeo Centenario de Torreón: 2007. * Copa Independencia: 2007. * Copa Xango: 2008. * Trofeo IPN 75 Aniversario: 2011. * Copa Centenario Real Club España: 2012. * Trofeo Bandera Nacional: 2013. * Trofeo IMSS 70 aniversario: 2013. * Trofeo UANL 80 aniversario: 2013. === Distintions and awards === * FMF Golden Soccerball for Champion Team (2): Clausura 2008,Entrega FMF Balón de Oro Apertura 2007 y Clausura 2008Clausura 2012Ganadores del Balon de Oro Clausura 2012 * FMF Golden Soccerball for First place Team (2): Apertura 2007, Clausura 2012 * Fair Play FMF Golden Soccerball (1): Clausura 2005, * Brand of the Year 2012Received Santos Brand of the Year Award (Spanish) ==References== Category:Mexican football clubs Category:Coahuila Category:1983 establishments in North America Category:1980s establishments in Mexico
title: Santos Laguna
